Directions

Our church is located at 50 Northridge Drive, Daly City, CA 94015. Use this form to get directions on Google Maps:

In general, we want to be mindful of our neighbors. Not only is it in our best interest to avoid having the streets turned into permit-enforced parking areas, but we would also be poor witnesses if we were blindly inconsiderate of the people who live there.

Parking

Main parking lot

This parking lot at ground level is reserved for our congregation, but please leave these spaces available for visitors and families with small children. The lower level is available, but you may be double parked by the other congregation until 3-4pm if you park there.

Northridge Drive

Please do not park on the side of Northridge Drive facing our church between Avalon Drive and the main parking lot entrance. You may park on the side of Northridge Drive facing our church, past our main parking lot entrance and along Northridge Park.

Side parking lot

This parking lot should only be used by the elderly and disabled.

Highland Avenue

You may park on these streets that intersect with Northridge Drive as long as you leave a few spots open for the residents.

Skyline Drive

While this may seem far, it's actually not any farther than many of the parking spots along Avalon Drive. There is a fair amount of parking here and for now, you may park anywhere along Skyline Drive.

Carmel Avenue

You may park on these streets that intersect with Northridge Drive as long as you leave a few spots open for the residents.

Avalon Drive

Please do not park on the residential side of Avalon Drive. You may park along the side of Avalon Drive facing the ocean.

Eaton Avenue

You may park on these streets that intersect with Northridge Drive as long as you leave a few spots open for the residents.
